system.description: Automatically equipped in each empty hand slot.

ALSO: Martial Artist, Pugilist, Street Fighter

  • Are you trying to win a tournament, or did someone steal your significant other?

  • Would you eat floor chicken? What about wall chicken?

  • Which stereotypes of your culture do you embody?

  • How many times were you thrown off a volcano?

BRAWLER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Health Points by 5.

BRAWLER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.9iYytTSGAbEXr8Qo]{Parry}

When you are about to be hit by a melee attack, you may perform an Accuracy Check as if you were attacking unarmed. Then, compare both results:

  • If yours is higher, halve that attack’s damage.

  • If yours is lower, you take double damage from it.

  • If they are equal, you get a Perfect Parry and completely interrupt that attack: It has no effect.

If you use this Skill during a conflict, you cannot use it again until the start of your next turn unless you got a Perfect Parry.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.ftv2cnR4Cx9IxKpj]{Grappling Smash} (SL3)

When you hit a single creature with a flail or brawling attack and before you resolve its damage, you may set your attack’s total damage to 0 and perform an Opposed Check with 【DEX + MIG】. If successful, set your attack’s total damage to twice what it was, and continue resolving it.

Gain a 【+SL】 bonus to this check.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.hG34QQWLn0oW1tRM]{Attack Chain}

When you hit one or more creatures with an Attack, Offensive Spell, or a similar ability, you may set one of them as your Attack Chain target. You may only have one Attack Chain target at a time, and lose it at the end of the scene.

Whenever you are about to perform any sort of Check against your Attack Chain target, clear your Attack Chain and gain a +1 to your Check.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.mMAF7OQ047j4JqA7]{Combo Breaker} (SL2)

At the start of every conflict, gain 【SL】 Combo Break tokens. If you’re not wearing Martial Armor, you may spend one Combo Break token at any time to dodge an attack.

You lose all of Combo Break tokens at the end of the scene.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.aCw4kpkM9AyVVOwH]{Command Input} (SL5)

As an action, choose a number of Inputs up to 【SL】 and spend 【5 x Inputs】 MP.

Then, perform a check with 【DEX + INS】 against a DL of 【6 + Inputs】.

If you succeed, perform an unarmed free attack and add to it as many effects from the following list as the Inputs you chose:

  • Powerful: It deals +5 Damage.

  • Quick: It gains a +3 bonus to its Accuracy Check.

  • Wide: It gains multi (2) or, if it already has it, increases it by one, up to a maximum of multi (3).

  • Stun: Its targets suffer slow or dazed (your choice).

  • Command-Grab: You gain a +3 to your next Opposed Check against your target until the end of your next turn.

You may only choose each option once.

HEROIC SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.FuNQiKgWQTNt1ZUg]{Comeback Mechanics}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.07VsutNH5UP9zlNP]{Devastating Counter}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.qlHxkRmQGe1bVqfN]{Super-Armored Payback}

CREDIT

Class Design, Writing and Development Nitro

Layout by Ophan, based on the official Fabula Ultima layout by Emanuele Galletto

summary.value: Ignore the warnings of this World at your own risk.

system.description:
ALSO: Battle Mage, Geomancer, Sorcerer

An Elementalist has learned to channel the souls that flow within the basic elements of creation: Air, Earth, Fire and Water. Some of them develop complex spells to contain the powerful energies of nature; others seek its protection in harmony and communion. Elemental magic can be highly destructive, causing damage and inflicting negative status effects. Due to this, there are many who would covet an Elementalist’s abilities… often for nefarious purposes.

ELEMENTALIST FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Mind Points by 5
  • You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Ritualism discipline.

ELEMENTALIST SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.muhtqtJ6av32K34Z]{Cataclysm} (SL5)

When you cast an instantaneous spell, if you have an arcane weapon equipped, you may increase the spell’s total MP cost by up to 【SL × 10】 Mind Points. If you do so and the spell deals damage to one or more creatures, it will deal 5 extra damage to each creature for every 10 Mind Points by which you increased its total MP cost.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.zlmL0suZwTCQYzE5]{Elemental Magic} (SL10)

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Elementalist spell (Core Rulebook, page 188).
Offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) Elementalist spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check. 

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.b5zzfsWN7h5ugrnW]{Magic Artillery} (SL3)

When you cast an offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) spell, if you have an arcane weapon equipped, you gain a bonus to your Magic Check equal to 【SL × 2】 .

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.qgy43lWGmJ2YGhTp]{Ritual Elementalism}

You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Elementalism discipline.
Elementalism Rituals use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.v6rTedHMjbLuLdN3]{Spellblade} (SL4)

When you cast an offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) spell targeting a single creature, if the spell has a total Mind Point cost of 【SL × 10】or lower and you have one or more bow, brawling, dagger, flail, spear or sword weapons equipped, you may choose one of those weapons. If you do, your Magic Check for the spell will use the chosen weapon’s Accuracy Check formula; for instance, the Magic Check for an Elementalist spell cast through a bronze sword (Core Rulebook, page 131) will be 【DEX + MIG】+1 instead of 【INS + WLP】 .

ELEMENTALIST SPELLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.spells.Item.GOEbYMBu3cGnszWt]{[Elementalist Spells]}

summary.value: Quarter circle back, half circle forward, high punch!

system.description:
As an action, choose a number of Inputs up to 【SL】 and spend 【5 x Inputs】 MP.

Then, perform a check with 【DEX + INS】 against a DL of 【6 + Inputs】.

If you succeed, perform an unarmed free attack and add to it as many effects from the following list as the Inputs you chose:

  • Powerful: It deals +5 Damage.

  • Quick: It gains a +3 bonus to its Accuracy Check.

  • Wide: It gains multi (2) or, if it already has it, increases it by one, up to a maximum of multi (3).

  • Stun: Its targets suffer slow or dazed (your choice).

  • Command-Grab: You gain a +3 to your next Opposed Check against your target until the end of your next turn.

You may only choose each option once.

When you hit one or more creatures with an Attack, Offensive Spell, or a similar ability, you may set one of them as your Attack Chain target. You may only have one Attack Chain target at a time, and lose it at the end of the scene.

Whenever you are about to perform any sort of Check against your Attack Chain target, clear your Attack Chain and gain a +1 to your Check.

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Elementalist spell (Core Rulebook, page 188 or @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.spells.Item.GOEbYMBu3cGnszWt]{[Elementalist Spells]}).

Offensive @ICON[offensive] Elementalist spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

summary.value: One creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (10 Air, 10 Bolt, 10 Earth, 10 Fire, or 10 Ice).

system.description:
For 2 Inventory Points, one creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice).

  • Target Suffers: @DMG[10 air], @DMG[10 bolt], @DMG[10 earth], @DMG[10 fire], or @DMG[10 ice]

summary.value: This allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.

system.description: For 4 Inventory Points, this allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.
For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 hp].

summary.value: One creature recovers from a single status effect.

system.description: For 2 Inventory Points, one creature recovers from a single status effect.
For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 mp].

You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 fire damage.

Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.

The wind carries your strikes across the battlefield. You may immediately perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack may target creatures that can only be targeted by ranged attacks.

If you used a weapon belonging to the brawling or spear Category for this attack, it deals 5 extra damage.

If you hit a flying target with this attack, you may force them to land immediately.
